original_text: Their meat is to be yours, just as the breast of the wave offering and the right thigh are yours.
korean_text: 그 고기는 네게 돌릴지니 흔든 가슴과 오른쪽 넓적다리 같이 네게 돌릴 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Their meat is to be yours
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 고기는 너희의 것이 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: just as the breast of the wave offering
and the right thigh are yours
